1538748460: A great read with a twist! I've read a few of Harlan Coben's books and this one is no different. The story keeps you on edge with its suspense and fast pace. Jake's journey is both compelling and realistic. I found myself turning pages quickly, unable to put it down. A must-read for fans of psychological thrillers!
Loved the characters and the plot!  I could not put it down!  One of Coben's best!
B07Q6LNSX1: A great read with some twists I didn't see coming! The mystery around "The Box" kept me hooked. Fast-paced and full of suspense. Looking forward to more adventures with Jack Stone!
What a great action packed thriller! Great characters and plot!  I was surprised at the ending again! Keep up the good work!
B00LV4HZFM: Another great adventure with action and suspense! It will keep you reading to the very end and wanting more! Looking forward to reading more of Rogue Justice!
What a fast paced and suspense filled adventure! Great series! Looking forward to reading more about the Taylor family and plot!
B00LNN17M8: A story full of suspense and intriguing twists! Elliot is good! Looking forward to reading more of these stories! Keep it up!
I enjoyed the characters and plot! Looking forward to reading the next adventure for Stevie and Zane! I couldn't put it down!
B07C854RL5: A Merciful Fate was a gripping and intense read! The conspiracy and danger were well-paced, and I loved how Mercy balanced her personal life with the threats she faced. The emotional depth and moral challenges made the story even more compelling. Looking forward to more from this talented author!
Once again Elliot gives us a surprise ending thatch did not see coming😐 I am so looking forward to reading more of these stories!
